title: A remark on a generalized Suita conjecture for finite points case
authors: Qi'an Guan, Xun Sun, Zheng Yuan
abstract:
In this article, we use a class of harmonic functions (maybe multi-valued) to
study the equality part in a weighted version of Suita conjecture for high
derivatives and finite points case, and we obtain some sufficient and necessary
conditions for the equality part to hold when the harmonic part $u$ of the
weight is trivial.
